005package edu.wpi.first.util.datalog;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008
009/** A data log writer that flushes the data log to a file when flush() is called. */
010public class DataLogWriter extends DataLog {
011  /**
012   * Construct a new Data Log.
013   *
014   * @param filename filename to use
015   * @param extraHeader extra header data
016   * @throws IOException if file cannot be opened
017   */
018  public DataLogWriter(String filename, String extraHeader) throws IOException {
019    super(DataLogJNI.fgCreate(filename, extraHeader));
020  }
021
022  /**
023   * Construct a new Data Log.
024   *
025   * @param filename filename to use
026   * @throws IOException if file cannot be opened
027   */
028  public DataLogWriter(String filename) throws IOException {
029    this(filename, "");
030  }
031}
